title: How to Make Berry Ricotta Hotcakes

steps.headline: Put the flour and sugar in a bowl and stir them.
Mix the milk and eggs together.
steps.description: Stir until it is very smooth. Add the whisked eggs and milk to this.

steps.headline: Stir in half of the raspberries.
Pour one-sixth of the bowls mixture into a frying pan and swirl in one teaspoon of ricotta.
Cook until there are bubbles on top of the cooking mixture.
Turn over the hotcake and cook until it is golden brown.
Serve the hotcakes with any left over ricotta and the almonds, maple syrup, and icing sugar.

text: Put the flour and sugar in a bowl and stir them.  Mix the milk and eggs together. Stir until it is very smooth. Add the whisked eggs and milk to this. Stir in half of the raspberries.  Pour one-sixth of the bowls mixture into a frying pan and swirl in one teaspoon of ricotta.  Cook until there are bubbles on top of the cooking mixture.  Turn over the hotcake and cook until it is golden brown.  Serve the hotcakes with any left over ricotta and the almonds, maple syrup, and icing sugar.
